ti:edition.ti:label: De Sobrietate
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Wendland, Paul, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 2. Berlin: Reimer, 1897.

ti:translation.ti:label: De Sobrietate
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE ON THE WORDS THAT NOAH AWOKE FROM HIS WINE, OR ON SOBRIETY," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (George Bell and Sons, London, 1854)
